XData.name: ProductionDefinition
XData.Data: <Production Name="SAP.ESB.Production.SAPProduction" TestingEnabled="true" LogGeneralTraceEvents="true"> <Description>Тестовая Продукция (версия 2) для взаимодействия с SAP</Description> <ActorPoolSize>2</ActorPoolSize> <Item Name="EnsLib.JavaGateway.Initiator" Category="Servicing" ClassName="EnsLib.JavaGateway.Initiator" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="Created by the Java Gateway Production Wizard" LogTraceEvents="true" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Host" Name="Address">127.0.0.1</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="Port">55556</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="ClassPath">C:\InterSystems\IRIS\dev\java\lib\JDK18\intersystems-jdbc-3.0.0.jar;C:\InterSystems\IRIS\dev\java\lib\JDK18\intersystems-gateway-3.0.0.jar;c:\SAP\sapjco3.jar;C:\SAP\sapidoc3.jar</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="ProductionMonitorService" Category="Servicing" ClassName="Ens.ProductionMonitorService" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="Служба мониторинга состояния Продукции" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> </Item> <Item Name="Initiator" Category="SAP" ClassName="SAP.ESB.Service.Initiator" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="Отправка тестового документа в процессинг" LogTraceEvents="true" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="FilePath">C:\lab_in</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="FileSpec">*.xml</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="Destination">SAP.ESB.Process.IDocProcess</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="SAP.ESB.Operation.SAPWrapper" Category="SAP" ClassName="SAP.ESB.Operation.SAPWrapper" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="true" Schedule=""> </Item> <Item Name="SAP.ESB.Process.IDocProcess" Category="SAP" ClassName="SAP.ESB.Process.IDocProcess" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="Демонстрационный Бизнес-Процесс" LogTraceEvents="true" Schedule=""> </Item> <Item Name="SAP.ESB.Generated.SAPOperation" Category="SAP" ClassName="SAP.ESB.Generated.SAPOperation" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="true" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Host" Name="IRISHost">localhost</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="IRISNamespace">SAPEX2</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="IRISPassword">SYS</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="IRISPort">51773</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="IRISUsername">_system</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="JCoDestinationsDir">C:\Dev\Dest</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="JCoName">N4H-v014</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="LogFileName">c:\log-035.txt</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="SAP.ESB.Operation.SAPUnwrapper" Category="SAP" ClassName="SAP.ESB.Operation.SAPUnwrapper" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="true" Schedule=""> </Item> </Production>
